articles.author: Sarah Wheaton
articles.title: Wagner chief to Moscow: Swap in Chechens in Bakhmut - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Russian mercenary leader has threatened to pull out of battle for the besieged Ukrainian city.
articles.content:
Chechen units should relieve the Wagner forces in the battle for the fiercely contested Ukrainian city of Bakhmut, the head of the Russian paramilitary group urged Moscow on Saturday.
Wagner chief Y… [+913 chars]
